LanguageData.ARA_HiveMindMaster.label: Arachne Empress
LanguageData.ARA_HiveMindMaster.description: The Arachne Empress species is the central node of insect group consciousness, and controls all Arachne insect groups as the main brain.It has a large number of undifferentiated repair cells in its body, and is able to self-repair any damage at a speed unimaginable to ordinary people.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveMindMaster.stages.0.label: Connect to {0} insect swarm workers
LanguageData.ARA_HiveMindDrone.label: Arachne insect
LanguageData.ARA_HiveMindDrone.description: The Arachne insect is connected to the Arachne empress species in its heart.When the Empress dies, the Arachne insect also ceases its life activities.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveMindDrone.comps.1.letterText: A new Arachne insect {0_labelShort} has broken out of its cocoon and emerged! She wanders around waiting for instructions from the Empress species - she can complete the link with the Arachne Empress' information mark skill, or she can wait for the link to be built automatically.
LanguageData.ARA_NonPlayer_HiveMindDroneHediff.label: wild insect swarm
LanguageData.ARA_NonPlayer_HiveMindDroneHediff.descri: Having lost their connection to the hive mind of the Arachne insects, they can no longer act like wild beasts.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveMindWorker.label: arachne arachne
LanguageData.ARA_HiveMindWorker.description: Arachne flocculata is connected to the Arachne ficus in the heart.When the fibril dies, the flocculent also ceases its life activities.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveMindBeast.label: arachne beast insect
LanguageData.ARA_HiveMindBeast.description: Arachne beasts are more primitive life forms than other members of the Arachne family. Although they have simple heads and well-developed limbs, they do not follow the hive's pyramidal thinking as much. Within their hives, they receive command from any governor and empress species.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveStrength_Pluse.label: insect swarm blood
LanguageData.ARA_HiveStrength_Pluse.description: The repair cells of this Arachnidae family have reached a level that cannot be measured by common sense anymore.No matter how severe the injury, they are almost never destroyed.Furthermore, these powerful cells also provide resistance to damage caused by acid erosion and Arachnid acid.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveStrength.label: Insect colony vitality
LanguageData.ARA_HiveStrength.description: The repair cells of this arachnoid family are special and can self-repair wounds at an extremely rapid rate and even regenerate lost organs.These powerful cells also provide resistance to acid erosion and damage from arachnoid acids.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveStrength_Low.label: Insect colony health
LanguageData.ARA_HiveStrength_Low.description: Arachnoid insects have strong wound repair abilities and can quickly recover from various fatal damages. These powerful cells also make them resistant to acid erosion and damage from arachnoid acid.
LanguageData.ARA_LifespanHediff.label: record of lifespan
LanguageData.ARA_LifespanHediff.description: Hediff records the lifespan of Arachne insects, but it is basically hidden. Why are you looking at it?
LanguageData.ARA_TemperatureRegulation.label: cold blooded animal
LanguageData.ARA_TemperatureRegulation.description: The Arachnidae are cold-blooded animals and sensitive to changes in external temperature; agile and deadly in moderate temperatures, and difficult to move in unsuitable temperatures.\n\nThis species can operate at temperatures between 6 and 36°C, and gains an additional awareness bonus when temperatures are around 21°C.
LanguageData.ARA_TemperatureRegulation.stages.0.label: unsuitable
LanguageData.ARA_TemperatureRegulation.stages.1.label: adaptation
LanguageData.ARA_TemperatureRegulation.stages.2.label: comfortable
LanguageData.ARA_RaceBaseSwarmProduceSwitchHediff.des: This arachne insect is prohibited from breeding due to its hive thinking.
LanguageData.ARA_Hive_Cannot_Speak.label: I can't speak
LanguageData.ARA_Hive_Cannot_Speak.description: Well, actually, this insect can't talk, you already knew that, right?
LanguageData.ARA_ChitinArmor.label: chitin armor
LanguageData.ARA_ChitinArmor.description: It is a shell that covers the body of Arachne insects.Depending on its thickness, it provides protection for Arachne insects.
LanguageData.ARA_ChitinArmor.stages.0.label: Ultra thin
LanguageData.ARA_ChitinArmor.stages.1.label: thin
LanguageData.ARA_ChitinArmor.stages.2.label: Moderately
LanguageData.ARA_ChitinArmor.stages.3.label: somewhat thick
LanguageData.ARA_ChitinArmor.stages.4.label: thick
LanguageData.ARA_ChitinArmor.stages.5.label: Extremely thick
LanguageData.ARA_ChitinArmor.stages.6.label: rock solid
LanguageData.ARA_ChitinArmor.stages.7.label: Unrivaled in robustness
